      • connectToServer

        private static void connectToServer()
        Uses self signed certificate "ca.store" to authenticate a handshake with the server. if server not present closes automatically. once connected either read objects or strings from the socket Input stream

      • disconnectFromServer

        private static int disconnectFromServer(boolean shuttingDown)

      • readStringsFromServer

      • readObjectsFromServer

        method reads Object/ objects from the socket input stream write each object to the global ArrayList, displays each object in the ArrayList as a debug on console.
